meanings.definition: A highly contagious viral disease affecting cats, characterized by fever, vomiting, diarrhea, and a decrease in white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Panleukopenia can spread quickly among cats in a shelter.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian diagnosed the sick cat with panleukopenia.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten blamed the missing treats on panleukopenia!
meanings.sent4: The shelter was a breeding ground for panleukopenia, infecting one cat after another.
meanings.sent5: The image of the weakened cat suffering from panleukopenia stayed with the shelter volunteers.
